summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of PolyForge 3D printing marketplace. All major e-commerce functionality working perfectly including product browsing, filtering, cart management, and complete checkout flow.

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile filter button has overlay interference preventing clicks
ui_bugs.details: Emergent badge overlay interferes with mobile filter button clicks

passed_tests: Home page hero section and navigation
Featured products display and add to cart
Shop page product grid and filtering system
Price range filtering and sorting functionality
Product detail page with specifications and quantity selector
Order success page and cart clearing
Professional design with emerald green theme
